name: Alabaster Tree
movement: walk 10 ft., can move faster with abilities
description: The Alabaster Tree is a large, celestial creature with an impressive presence, resembling a tree with razor-sharp leaves, embodying the essence of good and nature.
memorable: Its ability to move quickly while leaving difficult terrain and its unique abilities to protect allies and hinder foes makes it a powerful battlefield presence.
goals: To serve as a guardian of nature and protect those who are good-aligned.
relations: It may ally with druids, fey creatures, or other celestial beings.
environment: Typically found in lush forests or areas of great natural beauty.
strengths: High Armor Class, exceptional physical strength, can bolster allies, and has multiple environmental control abilities.
weaknesses: Vulnerable to magical damage, with no resistances against it.
attacks: Utilizes powerful slam attacks that deal both bludgeoning and radiant damage, with abilities to grapple and throw opponents.
most_powerful_ability: Churning Advance allows it to move rapidly while creating difficult terrain that disrupts enemy movement.
senses: Possesses blindsight up to 60 feet, allowing it to detect creatures without relying on sight.
skills: Has proficient perception skills, allowing it to effectively sense threats.
additional_information: Immunities to radiant damage and the stunned condition.
Can enhance the survivability of good-aligned creatures nearby.
Ability to identify creature alignments within range.
Unique forms allowing different abilities such as Cloud of Needles and Serrated Squeeze.
Supports allies by ensuring they regain the benefits of a long rest.
